AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: Defendant who had his trial begin after the court denied his motion to dismiss, requested continuances to file pretrial motions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: Co-defendant in the case with Raymond McMillon, also requested continuances to file pretrial motions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: Defendants who were granted continuances by the court due to insufficient time for preparation under the Speedy Trial Act
